ing: 1 apple, cored and chopped with peel
des: "A favorite in my family passed on for generations.  It is so simple. I ususally just serve it with mashed potatoes and a salad."
ins: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add pork and brown. Add can of sauerkraut with liquids, then add apple. Stir until all are simmering, then lower heat and cover. Let simmer for 1 hour or until pork is cooked through and tender.
